data.eml:eml: New species of Pisionidens (Sigalionidae, Annelida) from Akumal, México

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Petersen, H. Cecilie B., Gonzalez, Brett C., Martínez, Alejandro, Worsaae, Katrine (2016): New species of Pisionidens (Sigalionidae, Annelida) from Akumal, México. Zootaxa 4136 (1): 165-173, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4136.1.8
